articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google reveals the Pixel 10, and yep, it looks like the Pixel 9 - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google’s next smartphone keeps the same design.

articles.author: Lily Mae Lazarus
articles.title: Astronomer's new interim CEO breaks his silence after the tech company’s viral scandal shook the internet - Fortune
articles.description: "The spotlight has been unusual and surreal for our team and, while I would never have wished for it to happen like this, Astronomer is now a household name,” said cofounder Pete DeJoy.
articles.content: Astronomers interim CEO addressed the public for the first time since taking over for his scandal-laden predecessor Andy Byron. Pete DeJoy, who co-founded the tech unicorn, was named interim head of … [+1397 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: A Bangladesh Air Force training jet crashes into a school in Dhaka and kills at least 20 - NPR
articles.description: The Chinese-made F-7 BGI training jet experienced a "technical malfunction" moments after takeoff before it crashed into a school, according to Bangladesh's military.
articles.content: DHAKA, Bangladesh A Bangladesh Air Force training aircraft crashed into a school in Dhaka, the capital, shortly after takeoff on Monday afternoon, catching fire and killing the pilot and at least 19 … [+3549 chars]
